mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Jenny [photographer]

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Question if reader is still a virgin ("V-card"), with yes and no as options, with responses in the form of tally marks, and even a written comment. Unattributed Latin quote by Descartes. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
V-Card? | yes no | yes and I'm a 21 yr old model like | Cogito ergo sum
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Quotations, Latin
Sex
Social surveys
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
